annotations.description: “I like to pay homage to the lesser known New Orleans cocktails,” says Maxwell Britten, head bartender of Brooklyn cocktail bar Maison Premiere. Britte
annotations.title: Old Hickory - PUNCH

textContent:
1 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth (preferably Carpano Antica)
1 ounce dry vermouth (preferably Dolin)
4 dashes Peychaud's bitters
4 dashes orange bitters
Garnish: orange peel

Add all ingredients to a mixing glass.
Add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain over ice into a rocks glass.
Garnish with an orange peel.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/old-hickory
title: Old Hickory
